**Starburst** is a Level 6 [Conjurations](/Conjurations "Conjurations")/[Fire Magic](/Fire_Magic "Fire Magic") spell that launches penetrating [bolts of fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") in all 8 directions. It is powerful enough to set [trees](/Tree "Tree") on fire.

## Contents

- [1 Strategy](#Strategy)
  - [1.1 Tips & Tricks](#Tips_.26_Tricks)
- [2 Gallery](#Gallery)
- [3 History](#History)

## Strategy

Starburst is a strong AOE spell. It's valuable when surrounded, since it targets every space around you (and hits much further). Compared to [Fireball](/Fireball "Fireball"), Starburst deals more damage at most reasonable power levels, but has a chance to miss.

If a monster isn't on a direct line of fire, try backing up. Since monsters try to take the shortest path to you, when you back up, they'll eventually line up with Starburst's attack pattern. See [Gallery](#Gallery) for a demonstration.

### Tips & Tricks

- Be careful around crystal [walls](/Wall "Wall") when using Starburst. As the bolts always travel in straight lines in all 8 directions, it's easy to accidentally bounce multiple bolts back at yourself.

## Gallery

- [![](/images/thumb/5/5b/Starburst1.png/300px-Starburst1.png)](/File:Starburst1.png)

  Monsters try to take one of the shortest paths at any one moment.

- [![](/images/thumb/8/8f/Starburst2.png/300px-Starburst2.png)](/File:Starburst2.png)

  So, when backing up, monsters will move themselves into a linear direction.

## History

- Starburst replaced the player version of the [Bolt of Fire](/Bolt_of_Fire "Bolt of Fire") spell in [0.25](/0.25 "0.25"), replacing the ability to target specific foes in favor of an 8-directional blast.
